sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="ingredientsForm" (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()">

    <label for="first-name">Ingredient: </label>
    <input id="first-name" type="text" formControlName="name">
    <button type="submit" [disabled]="!ingredientsForm.valid" click="goToIngredients()">Submit</button>
</form>
